name: Peter Runs From The Police And Into A Wall
name_original: Peter Runs From The Police And Into A Wall
description:
My first game in unity.

Play as local criminal rabbit Peter. The police are on your tail but your lil legs are just so fast and you keep running into walls.

There's swear words so if you are a small child do not tell your parents.

This is beatable but. um. yeah. im sorry.
